nodes.name: On Key Press
nodes.description: Triggers when a specific key is pressed.

nodes.name: Modify Health
nodes.description: Changes the health of an entity.

nodes.name: Create Entity
nodes.description: Creates a new entity from a template.

nodes.name: Destroy Entity
nodes.description: Removes an entity from the world.

nodes.name: Get Component Value
nodes.description: Reads a property value from a component.

nodes.name: Set Component Value
nodes.description: Writes a property value to a component.

nodes.name: If/Else Branch
nodes.description: Splits execution based on a condition.
